item.description:
This has become an annual event for us and not to be missed! Come down and meet our friend Beverly Kaye and see the treasures of her garden. If you are looking to spruce up your garden, this is worth a drive in the country.

The annual Sculpture in the Garden show will be held June 11th and 12th

on the property of Beverly Kaye Gallery, 15 Lorraine Drive, in Woodbridge. Recycled materials: junk yard finds, stone, wood, and even tractor parts all find their way into objects of desire. These one of a kind artworks can highlight a  garden or enliven an indoor wall or corner of your home. Families are welcome and the show runs from 9 am to 4 pm each day. New artists have been discovered and the stars from last year will return, so be prepared to be delighted!
item.why: Recycle - One man's junk another man's treasure!!
item.name: Sculpture in the Garden
